name: Run! (itch) (Faro.Mars.07)
description:
«Only press Spacebar to jump»

Project for Ludum Dare 50, unfortunatly, I wasn't able to finish in time and you'll see on the game, or maybe not, that's the problem ^^' you won't be able to continue... for some reason I don't understand...

I did have a lot of fun and learn a lot too, so it's a win for me since it's my first Ludum Dare and my second Game Jam!
